intro: Howardia pilosa, commonly known as the African violet, is a flowering plant native to South Africa. It belongs to the family Acanthaceae and is characterized by its dense, woolly foliage and clusters of tubular flowers. Its flowers come in a variety of colors, including purple, pink, and white, and bloom throughout the year under proper care. Howardia pilosa is popular as a houseplant due to its ornamental value and relatively easy care requirements.
